attributes.action: bestow an honour upon actress Lindsay Duncan, be it an OBE/CBE/DBE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lindsay Duncan is a truly exception leading actress of her generation and it seems a shame that she does not hold an honour - there seems no record of her having turned one down.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
